lines.name: Ambu's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate 2% of Life per second while on Low Life
Gain up to maximum Endurance Charges when you take a Critical Strike
Gain an Endurance Charge when you take a Critical Strike
Share Endurance Charges with nearby party members
Your nearby party members maximum Endurance Charges is equal to yours
Regenerate 2% of Life per second if you have been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText: Nothing stops the pain like a courageous rush into battle.

lines.name: Shavronne's Pace

explicitModifiers.text: (20-35)% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life

lines.flavourText:
Shavronne raced to Brutus' side,
her last hope against the Karui tide.

lines.name: Triad Grip

explicitModifiers.text: Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Fire Damage per Red Socket
Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Cold Damage per Green Socket
Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Lightning Damage per Blue Socket
Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Chaos Damage per White Socket
Minions have (5-10)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite

lines.flavourText: The secret of the elements lies within a square triangle.

lines.name: The Brass Dome

explicitModifiers.text: 30% reduced Chance to Block Attack and Spell Damage
Strength provides no bonus to Maximum Life
Take no Extra Damage from Critical Strikes

lines.flavourText: The turtle's shell one day becomes its tomb.

lines.name: Wyrmsign

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Concentrated Effect
4% reduced Mana Cost per Endurance Charge
Gain Rampage while at Maximum Endurance Charges
Lose all Endurance Charges when Rampage ends

lines.flavourText:
Those who witness the shimmering scales of the wyrm
know only fear for the rest of their lives.
Fortunately, the rest of their lives
can be measured in seconds.

lines.name: Grip of the Council

explicitModifiers.text: Minions gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage

lines.flavourText:
Death does not remove you from our grasp.
Death only brings you closer.

lines.name: Haemophilia

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks have 25% chance to cause Bleeding
(25-40)% increased Attack Damage against Bleeding Enemies

Bleeding Enemies you Kill Explode, dealing 5% of
their Maximum Life as Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
"A master artist takes his time when he's painting.
Unfortunately, my kind doesn't often have that luxury."
- Coralito, Brotherhood of Silence

lines.name: Farrul's Bite

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Cat Skill
+1% to Critical Strike Chance while affected by Aspect of the Cat
Critical Strikes have (10-20)% chance to Blind Enemies while you have Cat's Stealth
(40-50)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
It is a fool who strikes the turtle's shell.
The First of the Plains teaches us to exploit weaknesses,
and where no weakness can be found, to create one.

lines.name: Replica Grip of the Council

explicitModifiers.text: Minions gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage

lines.flavourText:
"I feel altered when Administrator Qotra wears these gloves.
Somehow, I find that disturbing." 
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: Bones of Ullr

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Raise Zombie Gems
+1 to Level of all Raise Spectre Gems

lines.flavourText:
The dead man walks where
the living fear to tread.

lines.name: Alpha's Howl

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
16% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills

lines.flavourText:
Nature respects the strong
And paints the snow red
With the blood of the weak

lines.name: Cloak of Defiance

explicitModifiers.text: 10% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life

lines.flavourText:
When the throat roars,
As eyes weep,
When the hand grips hard
With trembling fingers,
When belly twists
Yet legs stand strong,
That is the work
Of the Defiant Heart.

lines.name: The Restless Ward

implicitModifiers.text: +(20-25) to maximum Mana

explicitModifiers.text: (1-4)% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
Regenerate (15.1-75) Life per second per Endurance Charge
(100-200)% increased Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charge Duration

lines.flavourText:
Use the dead to stave off death,
An armour of bones and rot.
Hanging on with bated breath,
One lapse and all for naught.

lines.name: Thunderfist

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (18-30) Added Lightning Damage
Adds 1 to (40-100) Lightning Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The roar of the heavens
Strikes more than fear
Into the hearts of Man

lines.name: The Eternal Apple

implicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Spell Damage

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Warcry Skill on losing Endurance Charges, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
Trigger a Socketed Warcry Skill when you lose Endurance Charges
You lose all Endurance Charges on reaching maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
The empire is both the tree and the fruit.
It provides safe harbour as ideas grow within,
and when the time is right, the apple is picked. 
The idea, and our ideals, take root.

lines.name: Hyrri's Ire

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (13-188) to (24-262) Cold Damage to Bow Attacks
(13-188) to (24-262) Added Cold Damage with Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Hyrri loosed a barrage of arrows,
tipped with a poisoned hatred
only oppression can ferment.

lines.name: Abyssus

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 40 to 60 Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
When you have slain all of your enemies,
what is left to fear?

lines.name: Alberon's Warpath

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 80 Chaos Damage to Attacks
Summoned Skeleton Warriors are Permanent and Follow you

Summoned Skeleton Warriors are Permanent and Follow you
Summon Skeletons cannot Summon more than 1 Skeleton Warrior

lines.flavourText:
Alberon walked among the accursed,
and they welcomed him.

lines.name: Asenath's Mark

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Attack with a Bow, with a 0.3 second Cooldown

lines.flavourText:
Asenath's mind was as quick and nimble
as the fingers that drew her bowstring.

lines.name: Lioneye's Remorse

implicitModifiers.text: +(20-30) to maximum Life

explicitModifiers.text: -25 Physical Damage taken from Projectile Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Marceus' unblemished shield is a testament
to his arrogance... and his fate.

lines.name: Rise of the Phoenix

implicitModifiers.text: +(8-16)% to all Elemental Resistances
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +25% to Fire Resistance while on Low Life
10% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
Cannot be Ignited while on Low Life
100% chance to Avoid being Ignited while on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
My bearer shall be guarded by flame,
for I am the phoenix, forever radiant in glory.

lines.name: Southbound

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (30-72) to (44-100) Cold Damage to Attacks
Your Hits can only Kill Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Far south, the winter crawls under the skin.
Below the snow, adrift wanderers sleep.

lines.name: The Gull

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 1 Create Lesser Shrine when you Kill an Enemy
Gain (10-15) Energy Shield per Enemy Killed
75% increased Effect of Shrine Buffs on you
50% increased Duration of Shrine Effects on you

lines.flavourText:
"It is the Gull that delivers Man unto Ancestor.
The consumer of our flesh. The seeder of our
souls unto the earth. We give the Gull his life.
The Gull gives us our Way."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: Lightpoacher

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Spirit Burst when you Use a Skill while you have a Spirit Charge
+1 to Maximum Spirit Charges per Abyss Jewel affecting you
Gain a Spirit Charge on Kill
(15-20)% chance to gain a Spirit Charge on Kill
Recover (4-5)% of Life when you lose a Spirit Charge
Gain 5% of Physical Damage as Extra Damage of each Element per Spirit Charge

lines.flavourText:
The eyes of the living hold a glimmer of hope.
Don't waste it.

lines.name: Apep's Slumber

implicitModifiers.text: (5-10)% increased Spell Damage

explicitModifiers.text: +3% to all maximum Resistances while Poisoned
Regenerate (50-80) Energy Shield per Second per Poison on you, up to (250-400) per second

lines.name: Bitterbind Point

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Support Gems
+(5-8)% to Quality of Socketed Support Gems
+(3202-3988) to Armour during Soul Gain Prevention
Gain Arcane Surge when you deal a Critical Strike
Your Raised Spectres also gain Arcane Surge when you do
(40-50)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells per Raised Spectre

lines.flavourText:
Though we live and act as individuals,
in truth, we are tethered together. 
The barriers that divide us need not be broken 
for our spirits to become entangled.

lines.name: The Queen's Hunger

explicitModifiers.text:
Trigger Level 20 Bone Offering, Flesh Offering or Spirit Offering every 5 seconds
Offering Skills Triggered this way also affect you
1.5% of Evasion Rating is Regenerated as Life per second while Focussed
29% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life while Focussed
120% increased Effect of Fortify on you while Focussed
Regenerate 200 Energy Shield per second while a Rare or Unique Enemy is Nearby
Recover (37-40)% of Mana and Energy Shield when you Focus
(50-120)% increased Effect of Fortify on you while Focused
(10-12)% chance to Avoid Elemental Damage from Hits during Soul Gain Prevention
1.5% of Evasion Rating is Regenerated as Life per second while Focused
(18-32)% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life while Focused
+(3227-3987) to Armour during Soul Gain Prevention

lines.flavourText:
In their crimson nightmare, the Vaal are still sacrificing themselves to her glory and beauty. 
They stab their own hearts and cry out in ecstasy, only to rise again.

lines.name: Plume of Pursuit

explicitModifiers.text: Spell Skills always deal Critical Strikes on final Repeat
Spell Skills cannot deal Critical Strikes except on final Repeat

lines.flavourText: A dance as old as time.

lines.name: Ezomyte Peak
lines.flavourText:
Centuries of servitude, a day
of glory, an eternity of death.

lines.name: Devoto's Devotion

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
Swift as thought are the actions of Man 
when borne on wings of divine providence.

lines.name: Asenath's Gentle Touch

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Curse Enemies with Level 10 Temporal Chains on Hit
Curse Enemies with Temporal Chains on Hit
Curse Enemies with Temporal Chains on Hit, with 40% increased Effect
Non-Aura Curses you inflict are not removed from Dying Enemies

Enemies near corpses affected by your Curses are Blinded
Enemies Killed near corpses affected by your Curses explode, dealing
3% of their Life as Physical Damage

lines.flavourText: Cool the head and cool the blade.

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.name: Atziri's Step
lines.flavourText:
"Those who dance are considered insane 
by those who cannot hear the music."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Belly of the Beast
lines.flavourText:
There is no safer place
Than the Belly of the Beast

lines.name: Chalice of Horrors

implicitModifiers.text: 9% increased Movement Speed

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-3) to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
+20% Chance to Block Attack Damage from Cursed Enemies
Inflict Decay on Enemies you Curse with Hex Skills, dealing 700 Chaos Damage per Second for 8 Seconds
(10-100)% Chance to Cause Monster to Flee on Block
Curse Skills have 100% increased Skill Effect Duration
1% of Damage Leeched as Life against Cursed Enemies

lines.flavourText: An eye for an eye. A curse for a curse.

lines.name: Geofri's Crest

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Summoned Holy Relics
Summoned Holy Relics have (20-25)% reduced Cooldown Recovery Rate

lines.flavourText:
In the battle for honour, Geofri won.
Not so, the battle for survival.

lines.name: Honourhome

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (13-30) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
+20% to all Elemental Resistances while on Low Life
20% reduced Mana Cost of Skills when on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
"The craven mind is sharp with self interest.
The honourable mind is much easier to manipulate."
 - Malachai the Soulless

lines.name: Leer Cast

explicitModifiers.text: You and nearby allies gain (15-50)% increased Damage

lines.flavourText: For none of us are as cruel as all of us.

lines.name: Lioneye's Vision

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Pierce
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
"The Virtue Gems are a gift from the land, 
our land, and we will not let our gifts
be destroyed by savages."
- Marceus Lioneye

lines.name: Soul Mantle

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (14-20) Spell Totem
+1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems
Inflicts a random Level 20 Curse on you when your Totems die
Inflicts a random Hex on you when your Totems die, with 80% increased Effect
Inflicts a random Hex on you when your Totems die, with 80% more Effect
Inflicts a random Hex on you when your Totems die

lines.flavourText:
The greatest mistakes cause suffering 
long after they have been made

lines.name: Thousand Ribbons

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Elemental Proliferation
Adds (2-4) to (3-9) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (2-4) to (3-9) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds 1 to (4-12) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The night of a thousand ribbons
To remember the day of a thousand flames
When Sarn burned
And was born again

lines.name: Three-step Assault

explicitModifiers.text: (10-30)% chance to Avoid Elemental Ailments while Phasing
10% chance to Dodge Spell Hits while Phasing

lines.flavourText:
Move in with haste.
Strike quick, strike hard.
Vanish like smoke in the wind.

lines.name: Ahn's Heritage

implicitModifiers.text: +(10-20) to maximum Life

explicitModifiers.text: -10% to maximum Chance to Block Attack Damage
+(2-3)% to all maximum Resistances while you have no Endurance Charges
You have Onslaught while at maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
"It's not Karui, Azmeri or even Vaal in origin,
but one thing is certain. It is very, very old."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 46

lines.name: Stormcharger

explicitModifiers.text: 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText: Like lightning, the Ezomyte cavalry need never strike twice.

lines.name: Crown of the Inward Eye

explicitModifiers.text: (9-21)% increased maximum Life, Mana and Global Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: Divinity is not the only path to enlightenment.

lines.name: Snakebite

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Attack Speed per Frenzy Charge
6% increased Accuracy Rating per Frenzy Charge
10% reduced Frenzy Charge Duration per Frenzy Charge
Attacks have 60% chance to Poison while at maximum Frenzy Charges
While at maximum Frenzy Charges, Attacks Poison Enemies
+5% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Poison per Frenzy Charge

lines.flavourText:
"As the serpent shuns thought,
It shuns fear.
It strikes with the speed of wrath
And the skill of compulsion."
- Deshret, The Red Sekhema

lines.name: Sadima's Touch

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 4 to 8 Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText: Wealth unspent is wealth wasted.

lines.name: Bramblejack

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 2 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
-(15-2) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
(30-1000)% of Melee Physical Damage taken reflected to Attacker

lines.flavourText: It is safer to be feared than to be loved.

lines.name: Doedre's Scorn

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-2) to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
(10-20)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments per Curse on Enemy
Adds 37 to 71 Chaos Damage for each Curse on the Enemy
Curse Skills have (30-50)% increased Skill Effect Duration

lines.flavourText:
A scar of the flesh you'll never forget,
A scar of the mind you'll never remember.

lines.name: Matua Tupuna

implicitModifiers.text: (5-15)% increased Spell Damage
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
10% increased Effect of Auras on you
10% increased Effect of Aura Buffs on you
(10-20)% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills on your Minions
10% increased Effect of Auras on your Minions
10% increased Effect of Aura Buffs on your Minions
(10-20)% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills
Spreads Tar when you take a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
You carried me through life,
The least I can do is carry you through death.

lines.name: Shackles of the Wretched

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Hexes applied by Socketed Curse Skills are Reflected back to you
Curses in this item are reflected back to you
You cannot be Chilled for 3 seconds after being Chilled
You cannot be Frozen for 3 seconds after being Frozen
You cannot be Ignited for 3 seconds after being Ignited
You cannot be Shocked for 1 second after being Shocked
You cannot be Shocked for 3 seconds after being Shocked
You grant (4-6) Frenzy Charges to allies on Death

lines.flavourText: Captivity breeds creativity.

lines.name: The Oak

implicitModifiers.text: +(4-8)% to all Elemental Resistances
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate (3-6)% of Life per second while on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Even the mightiest tree was once just a sapling.

lines.name: Windscream

explicitModifiers.text: You can apply an additional Curse
50% increased Area of Effect of Hex Skills

lines.flavourText:
The mocking wind, a shielding spell,
The haunting screams, a maddening hell.

lines.name: The Baron

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
Half of your Strength is added to your Minions
+1 to maximum number of Raised Zombies per (300-500) Strength
With at least 1000 Strength, (1.5-2)% of Damage dealt by your Raised Zombies is Leeched to you as Life

lines.flavourText:
"The Emperor's trusted surgeons are not the only ones who 
practice the dark arts. Some of us are just more discreet."

lines.name: Goldrim

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 4 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText: No metal slips as easily through the fingers as gold.

lines.name: Doedre's Tenure

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
While Doedre lacked Maligaro's sense of style,
she surpassed her master in pure malevolence.

lines.name: Ghostwrithe

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Maximum Life Converted to Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: Faith springs abundant at the edge of death.

lines.name: Brinerot Whalers
lines.flavourText:
Those Theopolis fatcats put a price on our heads.
Let's see what they'll pay for their own.

lines.name: Skirmish

implicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Global Accuracy Rating

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Attack Skills have +1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems

lines.flavourText:
If two great leaders like Lioneye and Kaom
had been on the same side of the battle,
nothing would remain unconquered.

lines.name: Goldwyrm

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

lines.name: Voll's Protector

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Power Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Although a great leader during the war,
Voll proved disastrous in times of peace.

lines.name: Wanderlust

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText: All the world is my home.

lines.name: Bloodbond

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have (6-10)% chance to Dodge Attack Hits
Minions have +(6-15)% chance to Suppress Spell Damage

lines.flavourText: What mother wouldn't give her life for that of her children?

lines.name: Facebreaker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (600-1000)% more Physical Damage with Unarmed Attacks
(600-1000)% more Physical Damage with Unarmed Melee Attacks

lines.flavourText: Fly like a Storm Crow, crush like a Rhoa

lines.name: Ashrend

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Added Fire Damage
(10-150)% increased Physical Damage with Ranged Weapons
-(60-5) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText: The blasted oak stands forever.

lines.name: Lochtonial Caress

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% chance to gain a Power, Frenzy or Endurance Charge on Kill

lines.flavourText:
Why cling to your sanity? It offers you nothing.
Surrender to me, and I will grant you everything.

lines.name: Maligaro's Virtuosity
lines.flavourText:
Maligaro operated effortlessly,
with great speed and terrible consequences.

lines.name: Deerstalker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (11-15) Trap
(15-30)% increased Movement Speed for 9 seconds on Throwing a Trap

lines.flavourText: Anticipation, preparation, exhilaration, celebration.

lines.name: Kaltenhalt

implicitModifiers.text: 6% increased Movement Speed

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (10-15)% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
Reflects (5-50) Cold Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText: Cold, miserable and alone... but alive.

lines.name: Slitherpinch

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
A soft caress in dead of night,
that slips about the neck, so tight.

lines.name: Victario's Charity

implicitModifiers.text: +(8-16)% to all Elemental Resistances
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
10% chance to grant a Power Charge to nearby Allies on Kill
5% chance to grant a Frenzy Charge to nearby Allies on Hit

lines.flavourText: A man's life is the greatest gift he can give.

lines.name: Crest of Perandus

implicitModifiers.text: 3% increased Movement Speed

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

lines.flavourText:
"With piety and justice."
- Perandus family motto

lines.name: Icetomb

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Freeze Enemies for 1 second when they Hit you

lines.flavourText:
When Solaris closes her burning eye
At the end of time,
the world will perish in ice.

lines.name: Wake of Destruction

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 120 Lightning Damage to Attacks
Drops Shocked Ground while moving, lasting 2 seconds
10% chance to Cause Monsters to Flee

lines.flavourText:
Tempest's power given form,
Flee before the walking storm.

lines.name: Willclash

explicitModifiers.text: +5% Chance to Block Spell Damage per Power Charge
(3-5)% increased Elemental Damage per Power charge
Gain a Power Charge every Second if you haven't lost Power Charges Recently
Lose all Power Charges when you Block

lines.flavourText: Obtaining information depends upon pretending one already has it.

lines.name: Ancient Skull

implicitModifiers.text: Minions deal (15-39)% increased Damage
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have 50% increased Critical Strike Chance per Maximum Power Charge you have
Minions can hear the whispers for 5 seconds after they deal a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Primordial rage slumbers, waiting for the call
of the stars to return and swallow the world.
